description: Australia face India in the fifth Test at Sydney Cricket Ground - follow live score updates & radio commentary.
title: Australia vs India LIVE: Border-Gavaskar Trophy, fifth Test, day three, Sydney
title_page: Australia vs India LIVE: Border-Gavaskar Trophy, fifth Test, day three, Sydney â€“ cricket score & radio commentary - BBC Sport
maintext:
Webster hits the winning runs
Beau Webster capped a memorable Test debut by hitting the winning runs off Washington Sundar.
What happened after lunch
Travis Head and Beau Webster saw Australia through to target of 162
Jasprit Bumrah was unable to bowl with back injury
Webster hit the winning runs as Australia raced to target in just 27 overs
Australia won the series 3-1 to regain the Border-Gavaskar Trophy for the first time since 2015
They also qualified for the World Test Championship Final at Lord's in June, where they will play South Africa
